name: Sid's super naval combat
description:
Naval combat game for 1-2 players.

Your goal is to destroy enemy fleet.

2-player game needs two gamepads.

Controlls:

Choose ship - dpad on gamepad or arrow keys on keyboard

Change speed and direction - left stick or WASD keys

Aim - Right stick or numpad keys 2,4,6,8

Shoot - Trigers or space
